attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The children of the revolution apparently cannot be fooled. There is currently no policy allowing the fooling of such revolution children. Please give the power to fool the children of the revolution.
do. do. do do, do do. do do. do do. do do. do do, do do

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
